item.title: Jasprit Bumrah set to miss Champions Trophy group stage matches because of back swelling - The Indian Express
item.description:
Jasprit Bumrah Set to Miss Champions Trophy Group Stage Matches Due to Back Swelling

Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

Indian bowler Jasprit Bumrah is expected to miss the group stage of the upcoming Champions Trophy due to swelling in his back. He will be undergoing monitoring at the National Cricket Academy in Bengaluru.

  • Bumrah has been advised to report to the National Cricket Academy for recovery monitoring.
  • The Champions Trophy starts on February 19, with matches in Karachi, Rawalpindi, Lahore, and Dubai.
  • Selectors are contemplating whether to include him in the main squad or as a reserve player.
  • Bumrah’s rehabilitation is expected to last for three weeks, and he should be match-fit by the first week of March.
  • His participation in the last group match against New Zealand on March 2 remains uncertain.
  • Bumrah has experienced back issues previously and missed 11 months of cricket due to surgery.
“He (Bumrah) will be going to NCA for his rehabilitation. The initial report says he doesn’t have a fracture but has swelling on his back.”

The Indian team management is cautious about Bumrah's workload, with his health being a priority for the team's performance in the upcoming tournament.

item.title: Devajit Saikia elected as BCCI secretary, Prabhtej Singh Bhatia is treasurer - The Hindu
item.description:
Devajit Saikia Elected as BCCI Secretary, Prabhtej Singh Bhatia Takes Role of Treasurer

Published on: January 12, 2025 Source: The Hindu

Devajit Saikia and Prabhtej Singh Bhatia were elected unopposed as secretary and treasurer of the BCCI during a Special General Meeting held on January 12, 2025.

  • Saikia, the incumbent joint-secretary, and Bhatia were the only candidates for their positions.
  • The election was formalized without the need for a vote due to their uncontested status.
  • The positions became vacant due to the resignations of Jay Shah and Ashish Shelar.
  • An election for the joint-secretary's post is expected within the next 45 days.
  • Saikia has been influential in Assam cricket since 2016 and developed the Barsapara Cricket Stadium.
  • Bhatia has experience in BCCI administration and comes from a family with a rich background in cricket governance.
“Saikia has to strike a delicate balance along with national selectors regarding India’s men’s team’s transition.”

The election of Saikia and Bhatia marks a new chapter for BCCI, especially as they prepare for upcoming challenges in Indian cricket governance.

item.title: BBL 2024-2025: Match 32, REN vs STA Match Prediction – Who will win today’s BBL match between REN vs STA? - CricTracker
item.description:
BBL 2024-2025: Match 32, REN vs STA Match Prediction

Date: January 12, 2025 Source: CricTracker

Melbourne Renegades (REN) face Melbourne Stars (STA) in Match 32 of the BBL 2024-25 at Docklands Stadium. REN is coming off a recent win, while STA seeks redemption after a shaky start to the season.

Key Points:

  • REN currently sits sixth in the points table with 3 wins and 4 losses.
  • STA is seventh, having won 3 of their 8 games.
  • The pitch is expected to favor batsmen with good bounce, suggesting the toss-winner will likely bowl first.
  • Recent matches have shown STA's resurgence with three consecutive victories.

Notable Statistics:

Melbourne Stars' skipper Marcus Stoinis has scored 246 runs this season, and Thomas Stewart Rogers is the second-leading wicket-taker with 13 wickets.

In conclusion, it is predicted that the team bowling first will have the advantage in this match.

item.title: Who is Devajit Saikia? New BCCI secretary who takes charge after Jay Shah’s tenure - Mint
item.description:
Who is Devajit Saikia? New BCCI Secretary Who Takes Charge After Jay Shah’s Tenure

Publication Date: [Insert Date Here] Source: Live Mint

Devajit Saikia, a former cricketer, has been appointed as the new secretary of the BCCI following the departure of Jay Shah, who became ICC chairman. Saikia has been serving as interim secretary since December 1.

  • Saikia was officially elected at the BCCI Special General Meeting.
  • Prabhtej Singh Bhatia was also elected as BCCI treasurer, replacing Ashish Shelar.
  • Saikia insists he never intended to be a sports administrator but felt compelled to step in due to corruption issues.
  • A meeting was held with key figures like Rohit Sharma and Gautam Gambhir to discuss the Indian team's performance.
“It was never my intention to be a cricket or sports administrator. Even today I don't like being an administrator.” - Devajit Saikia

The appointment of Saikia signifies a continuity in cricket administration amidst ongoing challenges. His past experience in management and a fresh perspective may prove beneficial for the BCCI as they prepare for upcoming tournaments.

item.title: Watch: Female Fan's Epic Reaction On Spotting Virat Kohli In Public - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Watch: Female Fan's Epic Reaction On Spotting Virat Kohli In Public

Publication Date: January 12, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Star cricketer Virat Kohli was recently spotted at the Gateway of India with his wife Anushka Sharma, where a female fan's enthusiastic reaction to his presence became the highlight of the moment. Despite Kohli’s recent poor performance on the field, his popularity remains strong among fans.

  • Kohli and Anushka were seen enjoying family time in Mumbai.
  • A video capturing the fan's reaction to seeing Kohli went viral on social media.
  • Both Kohli and Anushka visited a priest in Vrindavan earlier, showcasing their devotion.
  • Notable quotes from Anushka highlight her spiritual connection and inner questions addressed during the visit.
“The reaction from the Girl when she saw Virat Kohli was priceless.” — Johns. (@CricCrazyJohns)

The couple's devotion is acknowledged by the priest, indicating its influence on Kohli.

item.title: ILT20 2025: Match 2, ADKR vs DV Match Prediction – Who will win today’s ILT20 match between ADKR vs DV? - CricTracker
item.description:
ILT20 2025: Match 2, ADKR vs DV Match Prediction

Date: January 12, 2025

Source: CricTracker

Abu Dhabi Knight Riders (ADKR) are set to face the Desert Vipers (DV) in the second match of the International League T20 (ILT20) 2025 at the Sheikh Zayed Stadium in Abu Dhabi. ADKR aims to improve after a disappointing exit in 2024, while DV seeks redemption from a poor season.

Key Points:

  • Match Date: January 12, 2025, at 3:30 PM IST
  • Venue: Sheikh Zayed Stadium, Abu Dhabi
  • Broadcast: FanCode App and Zee Network
  • Last season, ADKR made it to the Eliminators, while DV finished fifth.
  • Pitch favors batters and offers some assistance for spinners.

Notable Quotes or Statistics:

"Today's Match Prediction: Team Batting First to win the Match"

Probable Best Batter: Alex Hales recently scored a century in BPL with an unbeaten 113 runs.

Probable Best Bowler: Sunil Narine, a skilled spinner and former IPL MVP.

Scenario predictions suggest potential scores for both teams, depending on which team bats first.

Conclusion:

The match promises to be a competitive affair, with both teams eager to start their season strong.
